channel.title: Can someone make me a very simple bot to
channel.description: Hi! Can someone make me a "aimbot" to game called [url=http://hockey.tk]hockey.tk[/url]? "aimbot" means that it shoots always the puck to the goal or most near to the pillar. You get the "idea" soon when you try to play that game. if someone can make that im not sure if its possible but im very happy if someone can make. :) And if its possible i dont think that its very hard to make. I can too pay someone rs2 money. I have though that it works like this: When you shooting the puck, loading, making a shot, then when you press something putton the cursor goes to near the pillar and shoots it without taking the mouse left button down. AND!!!----[u]If you make this program you'll make HISTORY!![/u]!!!!! Im sure that many finland hockey.tk player is ready to pay real money about that program. it's a finland based game. 9/10 of the players are finnish.

item.title: Can someone make me a very simple bot to
item.dc:creator: @alohaicejamlol alohaicejamlol
item.description:
@alohaicejamlol wrote:

Thank you very much of course i can wait im no hurry As i said it don’t have to be complex program
but if someone can try to make it faster its very good too :rolleyes:

Read full topic
